ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened - divided

cookingTips: Brown sausage completely and drain excess fat before mixing with cream cheese
Spread cream cheese and sausage mixture evenly on crescent roll dough before rolling
Freeze pinwheels before baking for cleaner slices and more even cooking
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What techniques ensure these pinwheels stay together while developing a golden, flaky exterior?
